item.title: Monster Hunter Wilds ‘Title Update 2’ launches June 30
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

First details leaked via PlayStation.com.

Monster Hunter Wilds‘ second free Title Update will launch on June 30, according to a newly added block on the PlayStation.com website for the game.

The update’s release date was likely meant to be announced at Capcom Spotlight on June 26, which Capcom teased will feature details on the newest update.

Get the details from PlayStation.com below.

■ Title Update 2

Two Fan-Favorites Return

Two fan-favorite monsters, including Lagiacrus, layered weapons and a new Arch-Tempered monster headline the second free title update for Monster Hunter Wilds.

Arch-Tempered Uth Duna

The apex predator of Scarlet Forest is powered up and ready to defend its territory. Take on this Event Quest and be rewarded with a unique γ (gamma) variant armor set.

Layered Weapons

Take your fashion hunting game even further with Layered Weapons. Customize your weapon’s appearance without changing weapon stats or decorations.

Additional Content

Customize your hunting life even further with fun event quest rewards like the Doshaguma Mask, a free gesture set and a variety of paid cosmetic downloadable content extras.

And here is a screenshot of the website:

Monster Hunter Wilds is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

Thanks, r/MonsterHunter.
